languages.text: "Паскаль — Суждение. Модератор когнитивного процесса. Тот, кто принимает решение". {n}Голос Паскаля поднимается к своду обсерваториума и гремит под ним, словно гром.{/n}
"Pasqal was Judgement. The moderator of the cognitive process. The one who makes the decision." {n}Pasqal's voice rises to the vault of the observatorium and rumbles beneath it like thunder.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Паскаль — Суждение. Модератор когнитивного процесса. Тот, кто принимает решение". {n}Голос Паскаля поднимается к своду обсерваториума и гремит под ним, словно гром.{/n}

languages.text: 「パスカルはジャッジメントでした。認識処理の調停者。意思決定を下す者」{n}パスカルの声が観測室のヴォクスから発せられると、その真下が雷鳴のようにとどろく。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Pasqal was Judgement. The moderator of the cognitive process. The one who makes the decision." {n}Pasqal's voice rises to the vault of the observatorium and rumbles beneath it like thunder.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「パスカルはジャッジメントでした。認識処理の調停者。意思決定を下す者」{n}パスカルの声が観測室のヴォクスから発せられると、その真下が雷鳴のようにとどろく。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “帕斯卡代表‘判断’。他是认知过程的调节者，是决策者。”{n}帕斯卡的声音洪亮，如雷声般隆隆作响，直冲瞭望台的拱顶。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Pasqal was Judgement. The moderator of the cognitive process. The one who makes the decision." {n}Pasqal's voice rises to the vault of the observatorium and rumbles beneath it like thunder.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “帕斯卡代表‘判断’。他是认知过程的调节者，是决策者。”{n}帕斯卡的声音洪亮，如雷声般隆隆作响，直冲瞭望台的拱顶。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Pasqal était le jugement. Le modérateur du processus cognitif. Celui qui prend les décisions. » {n}La voix forte de Pasqal s'élève jusqu'au plafond de l'observatorium avant de redescendre et de s'abattre sur vous tel le tonnerre.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Pasqal was Judgement. The moderator of the cognitive process. The one who makes the decision." {n}Pasqal's voice rises to the vault of the observatorium and rumbles beneath it like thunder.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Pasqal était le jugement. Le modérateur du processus cognitif. Celui qui prend les décisions. » {n}La voix forte de Pasqal s'élève jusqu'au plafond de l'observatorium avant de redescendre et de s'abattre sur vous tel le tonnerre.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Pasqal era el juicio, el moderador del proceso cognitivo. El que tomaba las decisiones». {n}El sonido de la voz de Pasqal se eleva hasta la bóveda del observatorio y retumba debajo de ella como un trueno.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Pasqal was Judgement. The moderator of the cognitive process. The one who makes the decision." {n}Pasqal's voice rises to the vault of the observatorium and rumbles beneath it like thunder.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Pasqal era el juicio, el moderador del proceso cognitivo. El que tomaba las decisiones». {n}El sonido de la voz de Pasqal se eleva hasta la bóveda del observatorio y retumba debajo de ella como un trueno.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Pasqal war Richtspruch. Der Moderator des kognitiven Prozesses. Der, der entscheidet." {n}Pasqals Stimme erhebt sich bis zur Kuppel des Observatoriums und grollt darunter wie Donner.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Pasqal was Judgement. The moderator of the cognitive process. The one who makes the decision." {n}Pasqal's voice rises to the vault of the observatorium and rumbles beneath it like thunder.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Pasqal war Richtspruch. Der Moderator des kognitiven Prozesses. Der, der entscheidet." {n}Pasqals Stimme erhebt sich bis zur Kuppel des Observatoriums und grollt darunter wie Donner.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Pasqal, Hüküm'dü. Bilişsel süreçlerin yöneticisi, karar merci idi." {n}Pasqal'ın sesi, gözlemhanenin kubbesine kadar yükselip içeriye çakan bir şimşek gibi gürlüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Pasqal was Judgement. The moderator of the cognitive process. The one who makes the decision." {n}Pasqal's voice rises to the vault of the observatorium and rumbles beneath it like thunder.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Pasqal, Hüküm'dü. Bilişsel süreçlerin yöneticisi. Karar veren kişi." {n}Pasqal'ın sesi gözlemhanenin kubbesine kadar yükseliyor ve içeride çakmış bir şimşek gibi gürlüyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
